column1: Art Institute of Chicago////What a great museum and it's so big. We were there for 3-4 hours and still didn't see everything. They've got a good variety of things. It's so beautiful
column2: too. I like it better than any of the museums I've been to in LA. The view of the city was nice
column3: too. Everyone in the museum was very helpful to point me to what I was looking for.
